r.d: A number of functional primitives like map(), select(), each() for the PHP language
r.n: - Renamed all() to every() and any() to some() - Added drop_first() and drop_last() - Fixed property access with pluck() - pluck() now works with associative arrays - Added partition() - Added group() - Added flatten() - Added first() and last() - Added product(), sum(), ratio(), difference() - Added unique() - Fixed a lot of memory leaks
